departments.description: Leading artificial intelligence research and development

departments.name: Web Development
departments.description: Full-stack web development and digital solutions

researchPapers.title: Multilingual LLM Alignment for Global Governance
researchPapers.abstract: This paper explores the challenges and methodologies for aligning large language models across different languages and cultural contexts to support global governance frameworks. We propose novel techniques for cross-linguistic value alignment and demonstrate their effectiveness in multilingual policy analysis.

researchPapers.title: Trustworthiness of Generative AI in Scientific Publishing
researchPapers.abstract: We investigate the reliability and trustworthiness of generative AI systems in scientific publishing workflows. Our comprehensive evaluation framework addresses bias detection, fact verification, and ethical considerations in AI-assisted research publication.

researchPapers.title: Scalable Differential Privacy for Healthcare Systems
researchPapers.abstract: This research presents a scalable framework for implementing differential privacy in large-scale healthcare systems while maintaining data utility for medical research and patient care optimization.

researchPapers.title: Federated Learning for Global Smart Cities
researchPapers.abstract: We propose a federated learning architecture for smart city applications that enables privacy-preserving collaborative learning across global urban environments while addressing regulatory and cultural differences.

researchPapers.title: Ethics of AI Personalization in News and Media
researchPapers.abstract: This study examines the ethical implications of AI-driven personalization in news and media consumption, focusing on filter bubbles, bias amplification, and democratic discourse implications.

researchPapers.title: Bias Propagation in Multimodal AI Systems
researchPapers.abstract: We investigate how biases propagate through multimodal AI systems that process text, images, and audio simultaneously, proposing novel detection and mitigation strategies.

researchPapers.title: Data-Centric AI in Cross-Border Medical Imaging
researchPapers.abstract: This paper addresses challenges in applying data-centric AI approaches to medical imaging across different healthcare systems and regulatory environments.

researchPapers.title: AI-Driven Disaster Prediction in Climate-Vulnerable Regions
researchPapers.abstract: We develop AI models for predicting natural disasters in climate-vulnerable regions, incorporating local environmental data and socioeconomic factors for improved accuracy.

researchPapers.title: Machine Learning for Early Pandemic Detection
researchPapers.abstract: This research presents machine learning approaches for early pandemic detection using diverse data sources including social media, healthcare records, and environmental sensors.

researchPapers.title: Emotional AI: Cross-Cultural Training and Interpretation
researchPapers.abstract: We explore the challenges of training emotional AI systems across different cultures and propose methodologies for culturally-aware emotion recognition and response generation.

researchPapers.title: LLMs as Cyber Threats and Cyber Defenders
researchPapers.abstract: This comprehensive study examines the dual role of large language models in cybersecurity, analyzing their potential as both attack vectors and defensive tools in modern threat landscapes.

researchPapers.title: Global Cryptography Standards in Post-Quantum Security
researchPapers.abstract: We analyze the evolution of global cryptography standards in preparation for quantum computing threats and propose frameworks for international coordination in post-quantum security implementation.

researchPapers.title: AI-Powered Deepfake Detection in International Law
researchPapers.abstract: This paper examines the legal implications of AI-powered deepfake detection technologies and proposes frameworks for their use in international legal proceedings and evidence authentication.

researchPapers.title: Cyber Risk Quantification for Insurance Models
researchPapers.abstract: We develop advanced mathematical models for quantifying cyber risks in insurance contexts, incorporating AI-driven threat assessment and dynamic risk evaluation methodologies.

researchPapers.title: Penetration Testing with Reinforcement Learning Agents
researchPapers.abstract: This research introduces reinforcement learning agents for automated penetration testing, demonstrating improved efficiency and coverage in identifying security vulnerabilities.

researchPapers.title: Cross-Border Data Breach Incident Response Frameworks
researchPapers.abstract: We propose standardized frameworks for coordinating incident response across international borders, addressing legal, technical, and diplomatic challenges in global cyber incident management.

researchPapers.title: AI Red-Teaming: An Evaluation Methodology
researchPapers.abstract: This paper presents comprehensive methodologies for AI red-teaming, providing frameworks for adversarial testing of AI systems to identify vulnerabilities and improve robustness.

researchPapers.title: Threat Modeling in Multilingual Phishing Attacks
researchPapers.abstract: We analyze threat modeling approaches for multilingual phishing attacks, examining cultural and linguistic factors that influence attack effectiveness and defense strategies.

researchPapers.title: Autonomous Systems Under Cyber Duress
researchPapers.abstract: This research examines the behavior and decision-making processes of autonomous systems when subjected to cyber attacks, proposing resilience mechanisms for critical infrastructure protection.

researchPapers.title: Blockchain for Securing IoT Authentication
researchPapers.abstract: We propose a blockchain-based framework for securing IoT device authentication that addresses scalability, energy efficiency, and security challenges in large-scale IoT deployments.

researchPapers.title: Humanoid Robots in High-Risk Industrial Environments
researchPapers.abstract: This study explores the deployment of humanoid robots in hazardous industrial settings, addressing safety protocols, human-robot interaction, and risk mitigation strategies.

researchPapers.title: Robotics for Sustainable Deep-Sea Exploration
researchPapers.abstract: We present innovative robotic systems designed for sustainable deep-sea exploration, focusing on environmental impact minimization and long-term autonomous operation capabilities.

researchPapers.title: Cross-Cultural Behavior Modeling for Social Robots
researchPapers.abstract: This research addresses the challenges of modeling culturally appropriate behaviors in social robots, proposing adaptive algorithms that adjust to cultural contexts and social norms.

researchPapers.title: Reinforcement Learning in Autonomous Surgical Robotics
researchPapers.abstract: We explore the application of reinforcement learning techniques in autonomous surgical robotics, focusing on precision, safety, and adaptability in minimally invasive procedures.

researchPapers.title: Emotion-Aware Robotics for Elderly Care
researchPapers.abstract: This paper presents emotion-aware robotic systems designed for elderly care, incorporating affective computing and empathetic interaction capabilities for improved quality of life.

researchPapers.title: Energy-Efficient Swarm Robotics Control Algorithms
researchPapers.abstract: We develop energy-efficient control algorithms for swarm robotics applications, optimizing coordination protocols and communication strategies to maximize operational lifetime.

researchPapers.title: Decentralized AI for Inter-Robot Communication
researchPapers.abstract: This research presents decentralized AI architectures for inter-robot communication, enabling robust and scalable coordination in multi-robot systems without central control.

researchPapers.title: AI-Driven Dexterity in Robotic Manipulation
researchPapers.abstract: We present AI-driven approaches for enhancing dexterity in robotic manipulation tasks, combining deep learning with tactile sensing for improved object handling and precision.

researchPapers.title: Spaceborne Robotics for Infrastructure Assembly
researchPapers.abstract: This study explores the deployment of spaceborne robotic systems for infrastructure assembly in orbit, addressing challenges of zero-gravity construction and autonomous operation.

researchPapers.title: Safety and Accountability in Lethal Autonomous Weapons
researchPapers.abstract: We examine safety protocols and accountability frameworks for lethal autonomous weapons systems, addressing ethical, legal, and technical challenges in military robotics applications.

researchPapers.title: Laser Communication Protocols for Deep Space
researchPapers.abstract: This research develops advanced laser communication protocols optimized for deep space missions, addressing signal degradation, pointing accuracy, and data integrity challenges.

researchPapers.title: Cybersecurity in Lunar Surface Missions
researchPapers.abstract: We analyze cybersecurity challenges specific to lunar surface missions and propose security frameworks for protecting critical systems in the hostile lunar environment.

researchPapers.title: Autonomous Orbit Correction with AI Agents
researchPapers.abstract: This paper presents AI-driven autonomous orbit correction systems that can adapt to various perturbations and maintain optimal satellite positioning without ground intervention.

researchPapers.title: Space-Based Data Relay in Disaster Scenarios
researchPapers.abstract: We develop space-based data relay systems optimized for disaster response scenarios, enabling robust communication when terrestrial infrastructure is compromised.

researchPapers.title: Swarm Satellites for Real-Time Earth Observation
researchPapers.abstract: This research explores the coordination and data processing challenges of swarm satellite constellations for continuous real-time Earth observation and monitoring.

researchPapers.title: Low-Earth Orbit Internet: Architecture vs. Regulation
researchPapers.abstract: We analyze the technical architecture of Low-Earth Orbit internet systems and examine the regulatory challenges and frameworks needed for global deployment.

researchPapers.title: Interplanetary Delay-Tolerant Networking Models
researchPapers.abstract: This paper develops networking models for interplanetary communications that can handle extreme delays and intermittent connectivity inherent in space exploration missions.

researchPapers.title: Satellite Hacking and Countermeasures in Global Law
researchPapers.abstract: We examine satellite hacking threats and propose legal frameworks and technical countermeasures to protect space-based assets under international law.

researchPapers.title: Edge Intelligence for On-Orbit Anomaly Detection
researchPapers.abstract: This research presents edge intelligence systems for real-time anomaly detection in satellites, enabling autonomous problem identification and response without ground communication delays.

researchPapers.title: Governance Models for Dual-Use Satellite Technologies
researchPapers.abstract: We propose governance frameworks for managing dual-use satellite technologies that balance scientific advancement with security concerns and international cooperation.

researchPapers.title: Blockchain for Transparent AI Training Lineage
researchPapers.abstract: This paper presents blockchain-based systems for creating transparent and immutable records of AI model training processes, ensuring accountability and reproducibility in AI development.

researchPapers.title: Sustainable Crypto Mining with AI Optimization
researchPapers.abstract: We develop AI-optimized approaches to cryptocurrency mining that minimize environmental impact while maintaining network security and decentralization principles.

researchPapers.title: Blockchain in Cross-Jurisdictional Supply Chains
researchPapers.abstract: This research addresses the implementation of blockchain technology in supply chains that span multiple legal jurisdictions, focusing on compliance and interoperability challenges.

researchPapers.title: Real-Time NFT Authentication in Global Art Trade
researchPapers.abstract: We present real-time NFT authentication systems for the global art trade, addressing provenance verification, fraud prevention, and cultural heritage protection.

researchPapers.title: Energy Credits and Carbon Markets on Blockchain
researchPapers.abstract: This study explores blockchain implementations for energy credit trading and carbon markets, focusing on transparency, verification, and global standardization challenges.

researchPapers.title: Decentralized Finance Risk Assessment with AI
researchPapers.abstract: We develop AI-driven risk assessment models for decentralized finance protocols, addressing smart contract vulnerabilities, liquidity risks, and systemic financial stability concerns.

researchPapers.title: Blockchain for Refugee Identity and Mobility
researchPapers.abstract: This paper proposes blockchain-based identity systems for refugees that enable secure, portable digital identities while protecting privacy and ensuring humanitarian access.

researchPapers.title: Tokenized Incentives in Smart Transportation Grids
researchPapers.abstract: We explore tokenized incentive mechanisms for smart transportation grids that encourage sustainable travel behaviors and optimize urban mobility through blockchain-based rewards.

researchPapers.title: Universal Healthcare Wallets Using Smart Contracts
researchPapers.abstract: This research presents universal healthcare wallet systems built on smart contracts that enable cross-border healthcare access while maintaining patient privacy and data sovereignty.

researchPapers.title: Blockchain Interoperability in National Digital Currencies
researchPapers.abstract: We analyze blockchain interoperability challenges and solutions for national digital currencies, addressing cross-border transactions, monetary policy, and financial sovereignty issues.

projects.name: AutoDrive AI Platform
projects.description: Developing next-generation autonomous vehicle navigation system

projects.name: CyberGuard Shield
projects.description: Advanced threat detection and prevention system
